content: Il padre di Roger Miller morì quando aveva solo un anno e sua madre si ammalò appena dopo, quindi venne mandato a vivere con suo zio a Erick, Oklahoma.
translations: eng:Roger Miller's father died when he was only one year old and his mother became sick soon after, so he was sent to live w
